manifest.name: Force note view mode
manifest.description: This plugin allows to force the view mode and editing mode for a note by using front matter
manifest.author: Benny Wydooghe

data.manifestValue: This plugin allows to force the view mode and editing mode for a note by using front matter
data.communityListValue: Force the view mode for a note by using frontmatter: YAML block with 'obsidian_ui_mode' as key.
